trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Bremerton
There were no other sightings in Bremerton on or around October 28th 2008
Summary: I saw 3 lights while driving, Then one light stand still for a couple minutes, then it started to move.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis took place in Bremerton, Wa. I was delivering a pizza for my job. My destination was 11th st place. I was going from the store, which is on the east side, to my destination. While i was crossing the Warren Ave bridge i looked to my left and three lights up in the sky. About 9 o clock to me. They were very bright. Brighter than stars. The lights were vertical with space between them, and it seemed like the outside lights were spreading further apart. Since i was driving and couldnt stop on the bridge, they soon were out of sight for me. And at the time i thought it looked weird but thought that it could just be flares. so after i crossed the bridge they were out of sight for me. i realized that my pizza delivery destination was near the water, where i would be able to see it, if it was still there. when i was able to see it again, there was only one light. i got out of my car and moved to where i could see it best. from where i was standing it looked to be over the port orchard area, but it was difficult for me to tell distances. i stood and watched it for about 3 minutes. it was very bright. and was basically still, not moving, except for small movements in a kind of wobbley way. after about 3 minutes, the light slowly dimmed. then all of a sudden it started to move. it moved to my left, which would be to the east. as it moved it got dimmer and dimmer, and then started to blink like a plane. then it just looked like a plane at night moving to the east until it was out of my sight. as soon as it started to move i said "what?" out loud. after this whole thing happened, i delivered the pizza and had to hold back from telling the people i was delivering to. then i called my wife and told her and drove back to the store. crazy.
